memoryVerse.text: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him, so that you may overflow with hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.

questions.question: According to Romans 15:13, what does the God of hope fill us with?
questions.explanation: Romans 15:13 says God fills us with 'all joy and peace as you trust in him.'

questions.question: What is the source of our hope according to this passage?
questions.explanation: The verse says we 'overflow with hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.'

questions.question: What must we do to receive joy and peace from God?
questions.explanation: The verse says 'as you trust in him' - trust is the key to receiving God's joy and peace.

questions.question: What does it mean to 'overflow' with hope?
options: To have hope that spills over to others
questions.explanation: Overflowing hope means having so much that it naturally spills over and impacts those around us.

questions.question: Why is hope important during uncertain times?
options: It makes us feel better temporarily
It anchors us to God's faithfulness
questions.explanation: Hope anchors us to God's unchanging character and promises, even when circumstances are difficult.

questions.question: According to the sermon, hope is NOT:
questions.explanation: Biblical hope is not wishful thinking - it's a confident expectation based on God's character and promises.

questions.question: What role does the Holy Spirit play in our hope?
options: He gives us the power to hope
questions.explanation: The Holy Spirit empowers us to overflow with hope - it's His power working in us.

questions.question: How can we cultivate hope in our daily lives?
options: Trust God and focus on His promises
questions.explanation: We cultivate hope by actively trusting God and keeping our focus on His faithful promises.

words.clue: A confident expectation in God's promises (Romans 15:13)
One of the things God fills us with
Inner calm that comes from trusting God
What we must do to receive joy and peace
The Holy ___ empowers us to overflow with hope
Believing in what we cannot see
